title: EXT_materials_clearcoat_darkening glTF Material Extension
description: glTF extension that defines the amount that the coat darkens the underlying surface due to internal reflections.

clearcoatDarkeningFactor.description: The amount of physically-correct darkening of the clearcoat layer.
clearcoatDarkeningFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The amount of physically-correct darkening of the clearcoat layer. If zero, no darkening due to internal reflections occurs.

clearcoatDarkeningTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer darkening texture.  The values are stored in sRGB.  Assume white colour if no texture is supplied.
